document_data.name: Jarvy
document_data.mainbody: '''Jarvy''' was a [[halfling]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Jarvy's humor was purposefully low-brow, meant for cheap laughs. When he told his tales, he did so in a bombastic way, as he believed that was the way [[bard]]s told their stories.
document_data.Activities: Jatvy was a merchant who owned an stand in the market square of the [[Protector's Enclave]]. He sold pies and vegetables. He also dreamed to be a bard, and so he made a few [[Currency|gold]] by telling tales and gossiping.
document_data.History: Jarvy survived the attack of the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]] and his [[plaguechanged]] minions of [[1479 DR]] not only once,
